Name: Hostile Dreams
About the game: Play through your gloomiest dreams! In this ragdoll-platformer, you have to survive challenging levels, avoid traps and enemies. Collect dream shards to unlock extra challenges, if the basic levels are not enough for you! Are you familiar with the feeling when you can't run in your dreams? Now, you can try it in Hostile Dreams! Be careful! No one will wake you up.
